snippet.title: How does childhood obesity work?: The Physical and Psychological Effects of Obesity
snippet.description: About 30% of young people, ages 6-19, are overweight or obese. Learn the causes, consequences and treatment and prevention of childhood obesity... obesity has also been linked to social and emotional challenges. For example, obese children are apt to have low self-esteem, deal with depression...
